content: marker sm p1 sm k to last stitch m1r k1 repeat these 2 row 6 more times 7 times total 49 stitches m a i n b o d y using main color row 1 k1 m1l k to marker m1r sm k1 sm m1l k to last stitch m1r k1 row 2 k1 m1l * yo k2tog repeat from * to 1 stitch before marker k1 sm p1 sm k1 * k2tog yo repeat from * to last stitch m1r k1 switch to cc row 3 k1 m1l k to marker m1r sm k1 sm m1l k to last stitch m1r k1 row 4 k1 m1l k to marker sm p1 sm k to last stitch m1r k1 row 5 k1 m1l k to marker m1r sm k1 sm m1l k to last stitch m1r k1 row 6 k1 m1l * yo k2tog repeat from * to 1 stitch before marker k1 sm p1 sm k1 * k2tog yo repeat from * to last stitch m1r k1 row 7 repeat row 3 row 8 repeat row 4 switch to main color row 9 repeat row 1 row 10 repeat row 2 row 11 k1 m1l k to marker m1r sm k1 sm m1l k to last stitch m1r k1 row 12 k1 m1l k to marker sm p1 sm k to last stitch m1r k1 row 13-16 work row 11 & 12 2 more times 97 stitches each repeat +48 stitches work row 1-16 of the main body 9 times total for large and 12 times total for extra large work row 11 once more and bind off on the wrong side using an icord bind off instructions below you may choose to continue in the main color or use the remaining contrast color for a fun color-shifting bind off the bind off will use approximately the same amount of yarn needed to knit 3 row if you feel that you don t have that much yarn left skip the icord and bind off loosely on the wrong side or if you simply hate an icord bind off i won t judge a b b r e v i a t i o n s k knit p purl pm place marker sm slip marker yo yarn over m1r insert left needle into the bar between stitches from back to front creating a new stitch on the needle knit into the front of the stitch m1l insert left needle into the bar between stitches from front to back creating a new stitch on the left needle knit into the back of the stitch k2tog knit 2 stitches together i c o r d b i n d o f f using mc or cc work an icord bind off on the ws co 3 stitches using a backwards loop cast on * k2 k2togtbl slip all stitches back to left needle and repeat from * until you have moved your last set of 3 stitches back to the left
